thread.section_title: Domidea Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel but remote
thread.title_full: Good hotel but remote - Review of Domidea Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Lutsy5
title: Good hotel but remote
text: Stayed here for 2 nights during a recent business trip and hotel was worth the money. Spacious rooms, great variety for breakfast and 2 nice restaurants next door (Chinese/Oriental and Italian). Would definitely recommend staying here and only 8.5 miles from Rome Ciampino airport. My only complaint was the bed which was quite hard and left me with a sore back for a few days but overall a good 7/8 out of 10.
